mapper.select: select p.id, p.title, p.content, p.status, p.reviewer, ur.name reviewerName, p.teacher, ut.name teacherName, t.college, t.major, p.student, p.update_time updateTime, p.create_time createTime from project p left join teacher t on t.owner = p.teacher left join user ut on p.teacher = ut.id left join user ur on p.reviewer = ur.id;
